quiz.title: EcoClima: The Climate Change Quiz
quiz.intro: This quiz will help you learn more about climate change and its impact on the environment.
quiz.getStarted: To get started, click the button below.
quiz.howAccordionDescription: The quiz consists of a series of multiple-choice questions about climate change. For each question, select the correct option. At the end of the quiz, your score will be calculated based on the correct answers.
quiz.whyAccordionDescription: Taking this quiz will help you learn more about climate change and its impact on the environment. Additionally, you can share your score with friends to raise awareness about the topic.
quiz.howScoreAccordionDescription: Your score is based on the number of correct answers. Each correct answer is worth 1 point. The maximum score is 10 points.
